QuestData.Title: Stalling the Survey
QuestData.Description: These maps have all been drawn by the same steady hand. I've seen a human surveyor heading up and down the road between the hold and the jungle to the east.$B$BWe can set their plans back by making an example out of this surveyor, $n.$B$B<Kilrok points to the signature at the bottom of the maps.>$B$BWhat do you think that says? "Zykes?" Even human names sound thin and weak. Kill him.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Search up and down the road south of Honor's Stand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and kill the surveyor Henry Zykes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you taken care of things?
QuestData.RewardText: Good, good. We've got to keep Honor's Stand isolated.$B$BAlone ... afraid ... $n, if we keep up the pressure, maybe someday they'll simply surrender the pass.
